title: B4 Player Looking for a coach
body: I started in season seven and improved for a while, I've hit a spot and haven't seem to be improving and I'm stuck in low bronze. I'm eager to learn and a good listener. Im looking for a coach to tell me how things are with my gameplay and help me improve and climb.

replies.body:
bro just watch pro players streams. i was bronze 5 last season, and im s4 now after playing just a month of ranked after watching faker and peanut, as my roles are mid and jungle.
save urself the money and watch coaching vids on youtube too

Hey theres a coaching website that does free coaching https://www.leaguecoaching.gg/ 
try it out. But if you want a proper coach it cost and you can check their ratings ect.

btw just care that you want the best people like challenger not like the gold 3 people who cost $10
just watch out for those guys they wont have much knowledge
Hey don't worry all good have a great learning experience
I can coach you out of bronze for sure.  add my ign
